title: Homemade Ginger-Cardamom Soda With Lime Recipe
full_text:

pods
green cardamom
, cracked
1
tablespoon
fresh ginger
, grated

Directions
In a small, dry pot, toast cardamom over medium heat until fragrant.
Remove pot from heat. Add ginger, sugar, water, and lime zest. Place back on heat and simmer until sugar is dissolved, about 5 minutes. Cool syrup; strain and discard solids.
In a cocktail shaker, add 1 oz. syrup (or to taste) and lime juice. Add ice and shake to blend. Divide between two tall glasses, filled with ice. Top with sparkling water, club soda, or sparkling cider. Stir gently and serve immediately.
Special equipment
Cocktail shaker, strainer
